issue.title: [CF 1019] Shadow Orbs Conditional Cap
issue.body:
Currently Shadow Orbs under 'Resources' caps out at 3. A new perk in WoD moves the limit up to 5. I know the expansion is not out but i was doing buttons in prep for WoD.

You can see the perk here:
http://www.wowhead.com/spell=157217/enhanced-shadow-orbs


> Posted by CurseForge user Torchler | Imported from CurseForge issue #1019 | Raw
